comment_text: If this is about controlling China, and China obviously knows it, then I don't see any reason for hiding it from the public instead of saying "this all is in order to combat China". Or maybe the means proposed are something that most of us aren't ready to accept in order to guarantee the economic supremacy of the West enterprises?
author: Maken
story_title: Whoever Is Leaking Trans-Pacific Partnership Drafts: Please Leak More
